snippet.title: Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles - Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles is a new city-building game set in the oceanic world of The Great Ursee, by BAFTA-nominated developer Tomas Sala, and it was revealed during the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2022

You can wishlist the game now, on Steam, by clicking here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/290100/
